# [FEAT] SMS Support

## Labels
`omnichannel`, `priority:low`

## Description
Implement SMS/text messaging support for ticket creation and communication.

## Requirements

### SMS Capabilities
- SMS-to-ticket conversion
- Two-way SMS messaging
- Automated SMS responses
- SMS notifications
- MMS support (images)

### SMS Configuration
- Phone number provisioning
- Short code support
- Multiple numbers per brand
- Keyword triggers
- Opt-in/opt-out management

### Agent Features
- Reply via SMS from ticket
- SMS templates
- Character limit handling
- Link shortening
- Delivery status tracking

### Automation
- SMS triggers
- Automated surveys via SMS
- Appointment reminders
- Status update notifications
- SLA breach alerts

### Compliance
- TCPA compliance
- Opt-out handling
- Message logging
- Consent management
- DNC list management

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports SMS text support with automated ticket triggers for managing text tickets.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] SMS creates tickets
- [ ] Two-way SMS works
- [ ] Automation supported
- [ ] Compliance features present
- [ ] Delivery tracking works
